name: Bodyweight Squat
description: Stand with feet shoulder-width apart. Lower your body by bending knees and hips. Keep chest up and weight on heels. Push through heels to return to start.

name: Jump Squat
description: Perform a bodyweight squat then explosively jump up. Land softly and immediately go into next rep. Great for fat loss and power.

name: Push-up
description: Start in plank position with hands shoulder-width apart. Lower body until chest nearly touches floor. Push back up. Keep core tight throughout.

name: Diamond Push-up
description: Push-up with hands close together forming diamond shape. Targets triceps more than regular push-up.

name: Wide Push-up
description: Push-up with hands placed wider than shoulder-width. Emphasizes chest muscles.

name: Pike Push-up
description: Start in downward dog position. Bend elbows to lower head toward floor. Push back up. Great shoulder builder.

name: Incline Push-up
description: Push-up with hands elevated on bench or box. Easier variation for beginners.

name: Decline Push-up
description: Push-up with feet elevated on bench or box. More challenging variation.

name: Burpee
description: Stand then drop into squat. Kick feet back to plank. Do push-up. Jump feet to hands. Jump up with arms overhead. Ultimate fat loss exercise.

name: Mountain Climbers
description: Start in plank position. Alternate bringing knees to chest rapidly. Keep hips low. Excellent for fat loss.

name: Plank
description: Hold push-up position on forearms. Keep body straight from head to heels. Breathe normally.

name: Side Plank
description: Lie on side propped on forearm. Lift hips off ground forming straight line. Hold position.

name: Plank to Down Dog
description: Start in plank. Push hips up to downward dog position. Return to plank. Dynamic core exercise.

name: Lunge
description: Step forward with one leg. Lower until both knees at 90 degrees. Push back to start. Alternate legs.

name: Reverse Lunge
description: Step backward instead of forward. Easier on knees than forward lunge.

name: Walking Lunge
description: Perform lunges while moving forward. Great for fat loss and functional fitness.

name: Bulgarian Split Squat
description: Rear foot elevated on bench. Lunge down on front leg. Excellent leg builder.

name: Glute Bridge
description: Lie on back with knees bent. Lift hips until body forms straight line. Squeeze glutes at top.

name: Single-Leg Glute Bridge
description: Glute bridge performed on one leg. More challenging variation.

name: Hip Thrust
description: Upper back on bench. Drive hips up. Best glute exercise. Can add weight.

name: Calf Raise
description: Stand on edge of step. Rise up on toes. Lower heels below step level. Can be done on flat ground too.

name: Single-Leg Calf Raise
description: Calf raise on one leg. More challenging.

name: High Knees
description: Run in place bringing knees up to hip level. Great cardio and fat loss exercise.

name: Butt Kicks
description: Run in place kicking heels to glutes. Good warm-up and cardio.

name: Jumping Jacks
description: Classic cardio exercise. Jump feet apart while raising arms overhead.

name: Bicycle Crunches
description: Lie on back. Alternate bringing opposite elbow to knee while extending other leg. Great for obliques.

name: Russian Twist
description: Sit with knees bent and feet off ground. Twist torso side to side. Can hold weight.

name: Leg Raises
description: Lie on back. Raise legs until perpendicular to floor. Lower slowly. Challenging ab exercise.

name: Flutter Kicks
description: Lie on back. Alternate kicking legs up and down keeping them straight. Keep lower back pressed to floor.

name: Superman
description: Lie face down. Simultaneously raise arms and legs off ground. Hold briefly. Lower.

name: Bird Dog
description: On hands and knees. Extend opposite arm and leg. Hold then switch. Great for balance and core stability.

name: Dumbbell Goblet Squat
description: Hold dumbbell at chest. Perform squat. Great for learning squat form.

name: Dumbbell Romanian Deadlift
description: Hold dumbbells in front of thighs. Hinge at hips keeping back straight. Lower weights along legs. Feel stretch in hamstrings.

name: Dumbbell Bench Press
description: Lie on bench. Press dumbbells up from chest. Lower with control.

name: Dumbbell Shoulder Press
description: Sit or stand. Press dumbbells overhead. Lower to shoulder level.

name: Dumbbell Row
description: One hand and knee on bench. Row dumbbell to hip. Squeeze shoulder blade.

name: Dumbbell Bicep Curl
description: Stand holding dumbbells. Curl weights up keeping elbows stationary. Lower with control.

name: Dumbbell Tricep Extension
description: Hold one dumbbell overhead with both hands. Lower behind head. Extend back up.

name: Dumbbell Lateral Raise
description: Stand with dumbbells at sides. Raise arms out to sides until parallel to floor. Lower slowly.

name: Dumbbell Front Raise
description: Stand with dumbbells in front of thighs. Raise arms straight in front to shoulder height.

name: Dumbbell Lunge
description: Hold dumbbells at sides. Perform lunges. Added weight increases difficulty.

name: Barbell Back Squat
description: Bar on upper back. Squat down keeping chest up. Drive through heels. King of exercises.

name: Barbell Front Squat
description: Bar across front shoulders. More upright torso than back squat. Targets quads more.

name: Barbell Deadlift
description: Stand with bar over midfoot. Hinge and grip bar. Drive through floor to stand. Best posterior chain exercise.

name: Barbell Bench Press
description: Lie on bench. Lower bar to chest. Press up. Classic chest builder.

name: Barbell Overhead Press
description: Stand with bar at shoulders. Press overhead. Lock out at top. Best shoulder exercise.

name: Barbell Row
description: Hinge at hips with bar hanging. Pull bar to lower chest. Great back thickness builder.

name: Barbell Romanian Deadlift
description: Start standing with bar. Hinge keeping legs mostly straight. Feel hamstring stretch.

name: Barbell Hip Thrust
description: Upper back on bench. Bar across hips. Thrust hips up. Best glute exercise with weight.

name: Pull-up
description: Hang from bar with overhand grip. Pull until chin over bar. Lower with control. Best back exercise.

name: Chin-up
description: Pull-up with underhand grip. Emphasizes biceps more.

name: Assisted Pull-up
description: Use resistance band for assistance. Good for building up to full pull-ups.

name: Dip
description: Hands on parallel bars. Lower body by bending elbows. Push back up. Great for triceps and chest.

name: Assisted Dip
description: Use resistance band for assistance. Good for building up to full dips.

name: Inverted Row
description: Bar at waist height. Hang underneath. Pull chest to bar. Good beginner back exercise.

name: Box Jump
description: Jump explosively onto box. Step down. Builds power and burns fat.

name: Box Step-up
description: Step onto box with one leg. Drive through heel. Step down. Alternate legs.

name: Wall Sit
description: Back against wall. Slide down until thighs parallel to ground. Hold position.

name: Farmer's Walk
description: Hold heavy dumbbells at sides. Walk for distance or time. Great functional exercise.

name: Plank Shoulder Taps
description: In plank position. Alternate tapping opposite shoulder. Keep hips stable.

name: Bear Crawl
description: On hands and feet with knees off ground. Crawl forward. Great metabolic exercise.

name: Crab Walk
description: Sitting position with hands behind. Lift hips off ground. Walk backward or forward.

name: Inchworm
description: Stand then walk hands out to plank. Walk feet to hands. Great warm-up and core exercise.

name: Squat Jump
description: Same as jump squat. Explosive bodyweight exercise for power and fat loss.

name: Tuck Jump
description: Jump and bring knees to chest. Advanced plyometric.

name: Broad Jump
description: Jump forward for maximum distance. Reset and repeat. Builds explosive power.

name: Skater Jumps
description: Jump laterally from one leg to other. Like speed skating motion. Great for fat loss.

name: Hollow Body Hold
description: Lie on back. Raise shoulders and legs off ground. Hold position. Advanced core exercise.

name: L-Sit
description: Support body on hands with legs straight out in front. Hold. Very challenging.

name: Handstand Hold
description: Kick up to handstand against wall. Hold position. Advanced shoulder exercise.

name: Archer Push-up
description: Wide push-up shifting weight to one side. Progression toward one-arm push-up.

name: Pistol Squat
description: Single-leg squat with other leg extended. Extremely challenging balance and strength.

name: Shrimp Squat
description: Single-leg squat holding other foot behind. Easier than pistol squat.

name: Nordic Hamstring Curl
description: Knees anchored. Lower body forward with control. Eccentric hamstring destroyer.
